title: Brody Jenner embraces girlfriend Josie Canseco at Malibu's Nobu after split from Kaitlynn Carter
text:
They're the children of high-profile athletes, and celebrities themselves.

Brody Jenner and his new gal pal Josie Canseco were snapped embracing Tuesday in Malibu, California after a lunch at the luxe establishment, Nobu.

The reality star son of Olympian Caitlyn Jenner, 36, and Weston, Florida-born daughter of baseball slugger Jose Canseco, 22, looked happy on the crisp autumn day in the well-heeled waterfront Southern California community.

Romance: Brody Jenner and his new gal pal Josie Canseco were snapped embracing Tuesday in Malibu, California after a lunch at the luxe establishment, Nobu

The Hills: New Beginnings personality paid homage to the late Johnny Cash with a black T-shirt that read CASH emblazoned with the singer's image. He wore black shorts, a ballcap and sandals, sporting a beard and sunglasses.

Josie donned a black tube top with blue jeans and wore her blonde locks up in a bun. The June 2016 Playboy Playmate of the Month looks to be Brody's first relationship since he parted ways earlier this year with Kaitlynn Carter after she and singer Miley Cyrus were seen on an Italian yacht in August following Miley's split with Liam Hemsworth. (Carter and Cyrus were briefly involved for about a month before they split.)

Brody last week told TMZ Josie is 'one of the most incredible women I've ever met in my entire life,' and 'obviously a representation of' her famous father, the power hitter who blew the lid off steroid abuse in baseball with the publication of his 2005 book Juiced.

'He's obviously a great human being,' Brody told the outlet, adding that he was anxious to meet Jose.

Affectionate: Brody embraced his new love, who he was first spotted with this past August

Rockin' style: The Hills: New Beginnings personality paid homage tom the late Johnny Cash with a black T-shirt that read CASH emblazoned with the singer's image

Praise: Brody called Josie 'one of the most incredible women I've ever met in my entire life'

'I haven't met him yet,' said Brody, who was previously in romances with Kristin Cavallari and Jayde Nicole. 'Am I nervous? I mean, it's always nerve-racking meeting the pops. Jose, I mean, he seems like a good guy, right? … I love Jose.'

He said he was hoping to pick up sporting wisdom from the slugger, who hit 463 home runs for teams including the Oakland A's, Tampa Bay Rays and New York Yankees, over the course of his 17-year career.

'I wanna know, does he interlock, or does he not interlock,' he said of Canseco's batting grip.

Stylish: Josie donned a black tube top with blue jeans and wore her blonde locks up in a bun

Famous fam: Josie is the model daughter of baseball alum Jose Canseco and his ex-wife Jessica Canseco

Jenner and Canseco were initially linked in August when they were spotted in West Hollywood, California. They were introduced by Brandon Thomas Lee and Frankie Delgado, Jenner's co-stars on the MTV series.

Brody's mother Linda Thompson told US last month that the couple shares plenty of common bonds, such as a passion for the outdoors and animals.

'And they have the greatest sense of humor,' she said. 'Both of them. They have the same sense of humor and they're both full of vinegar.'

Chemistry: Brody's mother Linda Thompson said that the couple shares plenty of common bonds, such as a passion for the outdoors and animals
description: The reality star son of Caitlyn Jenner, 36, and Weston, Florida-born daughter of baseball slugger Jose Canseco, 22, looked happy on the autumn day in the well-heeled community.
